tracks.name: Web Dev Foundations
tracks.description: Master the core technologies of the web, from basic HTML structure to advanced JavaScript logic. This track is the perfect starting point for your development journey.

modules.title: Code & Concepts
modules.description: Lay the foundation. Learn essential syntax, variables, functions, and the core principles of programming logic.

modules.title: Logic & Loops
modules.description: Master control flow. Dive deep into conditional statements, loops, and building interactive, logic-driven applications.

modules.title: Structure & Data
modules.description: Organize your code and information. Explore arrays, objects, and how to structure data for complex applications.

modules.title: Bugs & Breakthroughs
modules.description: Embrace the debugging process. Learn powerful techniques to find, diagnose, and fix bugs, turning frustration into triumph.

modules.title: APIs & Asynchronicity
modules.description: Connect to the world. Understand asynchronous JavaScript and fetch data from third-party APIs to build dynamic apps.

modules.title: Capstone & Celebration
modules.description: Bring it all together. Plan, build, and deploy a complete final project of your own design, showcasing your new skills.

tracks.name: React Mastery
tracks.description: Go from zero to hero with the world's most popular UI library. Learn to build fast, component-based, and scalable single-page applications.

modules.title: Intro to React
modules.description: Discover the React paradigm. Learn about JSX, components, and how to set up your first React application.

modules.title: State & Props
modules.description: Manage data within your application. Master the concepts of state and props to create dynamic and interactive components.

modules.title: Hooks & Lifecycle
modules.description: Unlock the power of functional components. Dive deep into essential hooks like useState, useEffect, and useContext.

modules.title: Routing & Navigation
modules.description: Build single-page applications that feel like multi-page websites using React Router.

modules.title: State Management
modules.description: Tackle complex state challenges with libraries like Redux Toolkit or Zustand for predictable and scalable state.

modules.title: Advanced React
modules.description: Explore advanced patterns, performance optimization, and testing strategies to become a true React professional.

tracks.name: Backend Essentials
tracks.description: Build the engine that powers modern applications. Learn to create robust servers, manage databases, and build secure APIs with Node.js and Express.

modules.title: Node.js & Express
modules.description: Start your backend journey. Learn the fundamentals of Node.js and create your first web server with Express.

modules.title: Databases 101
modules.description: Learn how to store and retrieve data. Get hands-on with a NoSQL database like MongoDB.

modules.title: RESTful APIs
modules.description: Design and build clean, well-structured RESTful APIs that other applications can consume.

modules.title: Authentication & Security
modules.description: Protect your application and users. Implement JWT-based authentication and learn security best practices.

modules.title: Testing Your Backend
modules.description: Ensure your code is reliable and bug-free by writing unit and integration tests for your API endpoints.

modules.title: Deployment & DevOps
modules.description: Take your application live! Learn how to deploy your backend to a cloud service like Vercel or Heroku.
